To join a clan we first need to be a member of a Steam Group.
The Clan Page lists all the public Steam Groups open to us and those

we've already joined. We simply choose one of our Groups and
label this as our clan.

Clans compete in worlds with 23 others, fighting over possession
of provinces on the Avatar Conquest map. Clans are ranked

according to the number of provinces they control. Owned provinces
are displayed via colour coding on the map. We can view
more details on this province via the tooltips.

Provinces are won by earning Clan Influence. This influence is
increased as clan members earn victories in a province. The control
of surrounding provinces also contributes influence.

The clan leader can mark a province as a priority target for their
members. By winning battles for our clan, we can earn tokens.

These clan tokens can be used to upgrade our veteran units
with new abilities and to reset our avatar skills.

Worlds are arranged in a pyramid system. At the end of a season,
normally a two-week period, the top clans are promoted up the

pyramid. The bottom clans are also relegated down a level before
the next season begins.
